product_name: Oboz Luna Low Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Oboz Luna Low hiking shoes offer versatile multisport performance and a supportive fit for supportive comfort on the trail. Synthetic leather uppers feature abrasion-resistant nylon mesh panels for just the right combination of breathability and protection. Nylon mesh linings wick moisture, dry quickly and further enhance breathability. BFit Deluxe footbeds feature a well-defined arch for support. Dual-density EVA midsoles provide excellent cushioning. Thermoplastic urethane chassis and nylon shanks support feet and offer stability for walking on uneven terrain. Oboz Luna Low hiking shoes feature high-friction, nonmarking rubber outsoles that grip with ease in all directions.
short_description: The Oboz Luna Low hiking shoes offer versatile multisport performance and a supportive fit for supportive comfort on the trail.
